title: How to Make Apricot Cream

steps.headline: Split the vanilla, put this and the sugar into the cream.
Whip this mixture with the whites of eggs until stiff.
Place a good teaspoonful of apricot jam in each dessert glass, and fill up with whipped cream.
Place the cream into the mixing bowl.
Beat the cream until it forms stiff peaks.
Beat again to combine the two ingredients into the whipped cream.
steps.description: The cream will take on a lovely orange tinge.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Transfer to a serving dish and place on the table. This goes well with chocolate cake or pudding or other desserts requiring a fruity cream.

text: Sweet apricot cream Split the vanilla, put this and the sugar into the cream.  Whip this mixture with the whites of eggs until stiff.  Remove the vanilla.  Place a good teaspoonful of apricot jam in each dessert glass, and fill up with whipped cream.  Vanilla apricot cream Place the cream into the mixing bowl.  Beat the cream until it forms stiff peaks.  Add the apricot jam. Pour in the vanilla extract. Beat again to combine the two ingredients into the whipped cream. The cream will take on a lovely orange tinge. Serve. Transfer to a serving dish and place on the table. This goes well with chocolate cake or pudding or other desserts requiring a fruity cream. Finished.
